thread.title: Great stay at Holliday inn
thread.title_full: Great stay at Holliday inn - Review of Holiday Inn San Francisco - Intl Airport, South San Francisco, CA - TripAdvisor

author: barnes6981
title: Great stay at Holliday inn
text: Was really great experience and nice rooms, great shower. Very enjoyable experience. Have coffee and tea in room, nice tv and Wi-Fi. Was expecting a queen size bed but think it was a double, we made it work however and still slept great, barely any noise from planes.
